column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////If you love Gilt Bar
column2: you'll love Bavette's.  Sexy atmosphere (we sat downstairs)
column4: and delish drinks.  Duck & Goat Cheese Terrine - awesome. If you've gotten anything on toast at Gilt Bar
column5: this will look familiar to you. Had a filet that was cooked to perfection
column6: and the herb roasted tomatoes on the side were delightful. Finally
column7: the elotes - love their spin on the classic streetfood.  Doesn't beat the original
column8: but I welcome this as an alternative side dish.
